get.summary: Gets all url given a specified Content Item identifier and a criteria.
get.operationId: Content Item Analytics: Get Shared Urls

get.summary: Gets all analytics given a specified Content Item identifier.
get.operationId: Content Item Analytics: Get Content Item Analytics

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Content Item.

get.summary: Gets the list of content items referenced by the specified content item, through the reference objects within the content type.
get.description:
A content type can include reference objects that point to other content items.
            Example: If you want all news articles in your site to point to related articles and videos, your content type for news articles must include reference objects for articles and videos.
            When you create a specific news article (content item), you can set the reference objects in that news article to point to existing articles and videos.
            This method retrieves the list of those existing articles and videos.
get.operationId: Content Items: Get Valid Reference Objects

parameters.name: contentItemId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the referring content item.

get.summary: Gets the content item with the specified client reference identifier.
get.description:
The client reference identifier is an external identifier used to synchronize the content item with clients.
            The HTML Pro module in Evoq uses the client reference identifier to associate the moduleId with the content item in the microservice.
get.operationId: Content Items: Get Content Item By Client Reference Id

parameters.name: clientReferenceId
parameters.description: The client reference identifier of the content item to get.

get.summary: Gets the number of times that the specified content item is used.

Generates the preview HTML code for a given basic visualizer displaying given content items.

parameters.description: The URL of the current page, used to create links to details for ListDetail visualizers.

parameters.description: The base URL to use to retrieve details of the associated List visualizer. Not for use with ListDetail visualizers. Default is null.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The current page number, used in list pagination.

StructuredContent.API.Dto.ApiKeys.ApiKey.description: Represent the api key entity returned by the service

scopes.description: Scopes of the api keys separated with ";"

StructuredContent.API.Dto.ApiKeys.ApiKey.description: Settings to create/update an api key

scopes.description: Scopes of the api keys separated with ";"

StructuredContent.API.Dto.ContentItems.C.description: The JSONObject structure that defines a content item.

id.description: The unique identifier of the content item.

slug.description: The portion of the URL that uniquely identifies this content item for retrieval.

contentTypeId.description: The unique identifier of the content type of the content item.

contentTypeName.description: The name of the content type of the content item.

name.description: The name of the content item.

description.description: The description of the content item.

language.description: The language of the content item.

alreadyPublished.description: Whether the content item has been published.

details.description: The JObject structure that contains the values of all dynamic fields of the content item.

currentVersion.description: The current version of the content item.

usages.description: The number of times that the content item is used.

createdAt.description: When the content item was created.

updatedAt.description: When the content item was last updated.

updatedBy.description: Who last updated the content item.

stateId.description: A code that represents the current workflow state. If 0, the item is in draft (unpublished) mode. If 1, the item is published.

tags.description: The list of tags associated with the content item.

clientReferenceId.description: An external identifier used to synchronize the content item with clients, specifically the HTMLPro module in Evoq.

seoSettings.description: Seo settings of the content item.

StructuredContent.API.Dto.ContentItems.C.description: Extends the AdvancedQueryDto class with additional fields that are specific to content items.

published.description: If true, only published content items are included in the results.

tags.description: The tags to search for. Comma-separated and URL-encoded. Example: tags=my%20tag,tag2,lastTag

StructuredContent.API.Dto.ContentItems.C.description: Settings to create/update a Content Item

contentTypeId.description: The unique identifier of the content type of the content item.

name.description: The name of the content item.

description.description: The description of the content item.

details.description: The JObject structure that contains the values of all dynamic fields of the content item.

tags.description: The list of tags associated with the content item.

clientReferenceId.description: An external identifier used to synchronize the content item with clients, specifically the HTMLPro module in Evoq.

seoSettings.description: Seo settings of the content item.

StructuredContent.API.Dto.ContentTypes.C.description: The JSONObject structure that defines a content type.

id.description: The unique identifier of the content type.

createdAt.description: When the content type was created.

updatedAt.description: When the content type was last updated.

updatedBy.description: Who last updated the content type.

name.description: The name of the content type.

icon.description: The icon associated with the content type.

description.description: The description of the content type.

enabled.description: If true, new content items of this content type can be created. Otherwise, not.

fields.description: The set of fields that comprise the content type.

numberOfItems.description: The number of content items that are of this content type.

numberOfVisualizers.description: The number of visualizers associated with this content type.

isSystem.description: If true, this content type is a default provided by DNN.

properties.description: The set of properties of the content type<!--, such as ??? -->.

StructuredContent.API.Dto.ContentTypes.C.description: Settings to create/update a Content Type

name.description: The name of the content type.

icon.description: The icon associated with the content type.

description.description: The description of the content type.

fields.description: The set of fields that comprise the content type.

properties.description: The set of properties of the content type<!--, such as ??? -->.

contentItemIds.description: List of content items assigned to the Visualizer Instance

StructuredContent.API.Dto.Visualizers.Em.description: Represents the Embed Visualizer Instance creation response

embedCode.description: Embed code in form of an html script tag

language.description: Language, currently is hard-coded to english

tagPrefix.description: the tag prefix used to search

tags.description: Delimit the tag search by a subset of tags

contentTypeId.description: if not null, the search is done for content type aggregations

contentItemsUsage.description: Number of time the tag has been assigned to the content items

StructuredContent.API.Dto.Visualizers.Vi.description: The JSONObject structure that defines a visualizer instance.

id.description: The unique identifier of this visualizer instance.

type.description: The type of this visualizer instance: Basic, Detail, List, or ListDetail. Default is Basic.

visualizerId.description: The unique identifier of the visualizer definition used to create this visualizer instance.

detailsVisualizerId.description: The unique identifier of the visualizer details associated with this visualizer instance.

contentItemIds.description: An array of the content item IDs associated with this visualizer instance.

referencedContentItemIds.description: An array of the content item IDs referred to by the content items associated with this visualizer instance.

pagingEnabled.description: If true, the list of content items returned by a query are split into pages of a specified size. Otherwise, the entire list is always returned.

dynamicFilteringEnabled.description: When set to true allows dynamic tags filtering

contentItemQuery.description: The query used to retrieve content items. For use with List and ListDetail visualizers.

createdAt.description: When the visualizer instance was created.

updatedAt.description: When the visualizer instance was last updated.

updatedBy.description: Who last updated the visualizer instance.

StructuredContent.API.Dto.Visualizers.Vi.description: Settings to create/update a Visualizer Instance

type.description: The type of this visualizer instance: Basic, Detail, List, or ListDetail. Default is Basic.

visualizerId.description: The unique identifier of the visualizer definition used to create this visualizer instance.

detailsVisualizerId.description: The unique identifier of the visualizer details associated with this visualizer instance.

contentItemIds.description: An array of the content item IDs associated with this visualizer instance.

referencedContentItemIds.description: An array of the content item IDs referred to by the content items associated with this visualizer instance.

pagingEnabled.description: If true, the list of content items returned by a query are split into pages of a specified size. Otherwise, the entire list is always returned.

dynamicFilteringEnabled.description: When set to true allows dynamic tags filtering

contentItemQuery.description: The query used to retrieve content items. For use with List and ListDetail visualizers.

StructuredContent.API.Dto.Visualizers.Im.description: Contains the result of an import file process.

visualizer.description: All the metadata asociated with the visualizer.

contentTypeNames.description: All the names of the content types that were created during the proces.

StructuredContent.API.Dto.Visualizers.Vi.description: The JSONObject structure that defines a visualizer. Extends the VisualizerBasicInfo class.

header.description: The HTML code that displays the header of the content item list.

template.description: The HTML code that displays each content item in the results list.

footer.description: The HTML code that displays the footer of the content item list.

contentTypeId.description: The unique identifier of the content type associated with this visualizer definition.

contentTypeName.description: The name of the content type associated with this visualizer definition.

scripts.description: The list of web scripts used by the visualizer definition.

cssFiles.description: The list of CSS files used by the visualizer definition.

id.description: The unique identifier of the visualizer definition.

name.description: The name of the visualizer definition.

description.description: The description of the visualizer definition.

iconUrl.description: The URL to the icon file associated with the visualizer definition.

isNew.description: If true, the visualizer definition is new and is not yet associated with a content item.

createdAt.description: When the visualizer definition was created.

updatedAt.description: When the visualizer definition was last updated.

updatedBy.description: Who last updated the visualizer definition.

numberOfVisualizerInstances.description: The number of visualizer instances associated with the visualizer definition. Equal to the number of content items that use this visualizer. <!-- ??? -->

isSystem.description: If true, the visualizer definition is a default provided by DNN.

secret.description: A secret key which is used to sign the HTTP POST request (for example a SHA256 hash).

active.description: State of the Web Hook, true active, false when inactive
